author: glenweyl
title: Change motivating examples in Chapter 5-3 to Anno campaign for governorship of Tokyo
description: Perhaps the most exciting application of â¿» ideas in the last year has been Anno Takahiro's gubernatorial campaign.  This belongs either in Chapter 5-4 (where many of the tools he used are) or in 5-3 given that his approach was even more immersive and sensorially immersive than most of the techniques in 5-4 are.  I would even support this being given as the motivating example in 5-3.  @nishio please consider writing this together with some of your colleagues.
